permafrost.tundra.flow

Class ConditionEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.flow.ConditionEvaluator

  • public class ConditionEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs webMethods Integration Server flow language conditional statement evaluation against a specified scope.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String condition
      The conditional statement to be evaluated by this object.

      Regular expression pattern for matching an IData node XPath expression.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpression> expressions
      Compiled node XPath expression.

      • evaluate

        public boolean evaluate(com.wm.data.IData scope)
        Evaluates the conditional statement against the given scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - The scope against which the conditional statement is evaluated.
        Returns:
        True if the conditional statement evaluates to true, otherwise false.

      • evaluate

        public static boolean evaluate(java.lang.String condition,
                               com.wm.data.IData scope)
        Evaluates the conditional statement against the given scope. This is a convenience method which constructs a new Condition object and evaluates it.
        Parameters:
        condition - The conditional statement to be evaluated.
        scope - The scope against which the conditional statement is evaluated.
        Returns:
        True if the conditional statement evaluates to true, otherwise false.

      • evaluate

        public static boolean evaluate(java.lang.String condition,
                               com.wm.data.IData scope,
                               javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext namespaceContext)
        Evaluates the conditional statement against the given scope. This is a convenience method which constructs a new Condition object and evaluates it.
        Parameters:
        condition - The conditional statement to be evaluated.
        scope - The scope against which the conditional statement is evaluated.
        namespaceContext - The namespace context used when evaluating XPath expressions against Node objects.
        Returns:
        True if the conditional statement evaluates to true, otherwise false.
